overview: Scott is a founder and is Chief Product Office of Scale, where he is responsible for the overall technology and product strategy at Scale. Previously, Scott was co-founder and CTO of Corvigo, where he headed the R&D efforts of the company, leading to the development of Intent-Based Filtering Technology. Prior to Corvigo, Scott served as VP of Engineering at Radiate. In both roles, Scott has been a key contributor to the overall business model, strategy, and success of the companies, beyond a technology focus. Scott holds a degree in computer science from Rose-Hulman.
